channel.title: How to slow exp down?
channel.description:
My servers exp is so fast that other players can max in like 5 mins which is not what i want. How can you slow the exp rate down so that maybe it becomes slower after you reach level 70/80 or so.
my server is based off evilscape
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 08:12:29 AM[/size][hr]Come on people i need help =D

item.title: How to slow exp down?
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

No matter what server base you use itâ€™s fairly easy.
Find the voids/booleans that give exp (easy if you search for amount of xp per hit) and change that to a lower number.
